spanGrp.span: Sa të jirö she-gẽ jirö kabekar
there are the Bribris who are different;
jirö deli tsõ jirö rö (_) bribri í rö esteee je rö diferente
we say what the elders say;
je je sa të jirö she-gẽ s (eh) sigeglö-wa jirö she-gẽ
people now do not speak [the language] and thus it is different,
*pe ka jirö she-gẽ jebi je rö diferente
like the Bribris; they are different.’
je rö (_) bribri-wa jirö-wa je rö diferente
